titlestmt.titleproper: Washington Square West Project Area Committee records 1974-1994
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Washington Square West Project Area Committee records
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The Washington Square West Project Area Committee records cover the period from 1974 to 1994. Collection includes minutes, correspondence, staff files on a variety of issued pertaining to neighborhood, such as parking, trash collection, housing for the elderly, homelessness, Locust Street Strip, etc.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Gift of Washington Square West Project Area Committee (Washington Square West Neighbors) care of William L. Quay.
